channel.title: U.S. Police Shooting News Tracker
channel.description: Automated news aggregation tracking police-involved shootings in the United States

item.title: Judge grants restraining order against DHS after Border Patrol kills Alex Pretti in Minneapolis
item.description: Federal agents shot and killed a 37-year-old man in Minneapolis on Saturday morning, less than three weeks after an ICE agent fatally shot Renee Good and amid an ongoing surge in immigration enforcement action across the city. U.S. District Court Judge Eric T…

item.title: Trump was surging after the Venezuela raid—then came Jerome Powell, Greenland and Minnesota. Now it feels like a ‘historic hinge moment’
item.description: "It's not acceptable for American citizens to be killed by federal agents for exercising their God-given and constitutional rights to protest their government."

item.title: Breanna Stewart holds up 'Abolish ICE' sign ahead of Unrivaled game
item.description: Stewart's statement comes in the wake of the deaths of two people who were fatally shot by federal immigration officers in Minneapolis

item.title: Alex Pretti’s Family Slams Trump’s ‘Sickening Lies,’ Gov. Walz Mobilizes National Guard As Democrats Threaten DHS Funding Block
item.description: Alex Pretti’s family is speaking out after the 37-year-old Minneapolis resident was shot and killed by federal immigration agents, accusing President Donald Trump and his administration of spreading “sickening lies” about what happened. The Guardian reports t…

item.title: Minneapolis shooting: NRA stress right to carry guns after fatal shooting of Alex Pretti by federal agents
item.description: The NRA criticised comments made by a senior federal prosecutor, saying it was “dangerous and wrong” to suggest that people who legally carry guns risk being shot by police.

item.title: Minnesota CEOs Seek De-Escalation After Border Police Shooting
item.description: More than 60 chief executive officers of Minnesota-based companies called for an immediate “de-escalation of tensions” between state, local and federal authorities as the state reels from another fatal shooting of an American by immigration agents.

item.title: Trump demands Democrats 'cooperate' with ICE in dark screed to deport 'illegal criminals'
item.description: President Donald Trump issued a dark, winding screed on Sunday evening following the latest incident where an immigration agent shot and killed a U.S. citizen. On Saturday, immigration agents shot and killed 37-year-old ICU nurse Alex Pretti at a protest agai…

item.title: Republican calls are growing for a deeper investigation into the fatal Minneapolis shooting
item.description: A growing number of Republicans are pressing for a deeper investigation into federal immigration tactics after a U.S. Border Patrol agent fatally shot a man in Minneapolis

item.title: Video Reveals ICU Nurse Killed By Feds Was Holding Phone, Not a Gun
item.description: Recently released video contradicts authorities' claims, showing Alex Pretti holding a phone when shot by federal agents in Minneapolis.

item.title: Some in GOP call for probe after Minnesota shooting

item.title: Alex Pretti's 'life was just starting,' mentor says
item.description: Alex Pretti, an ICU nurse, was shot and killed by federal agents in Minneapolis.

item.title: Target CEO Joins Minnesota Businesses Urging ‘Deescalation’ After Latest Shooting In Minneapolis
item.description: At least two U.S. citizens have been shot and killed by federal agents since a major operation began in Minnesota.

item.title: Some Conservatives Veer Off Party Line After DHS Agents Kill Another US Citizen

item.title: Oklahoma governor says situation in Minneapolis 'a real tragedy'
item.description: Oklahoma Gov. Kevin Stitt weighed in on the growing tensions in Minneapolis after a man was fatally shot by federal immigration officials Saturday, drawing protests to the streets.

item.title: America's largest labor movement calls for ICE to leave Minnesota before 'anyone else is hurt or killed'
item.description: A federal immigration agent shot and killed 37-year-old Alex Pretti, a US citizen, in Minneapolis on Saturday. He was an ICU nurse at a VA hospital.

item.title: Latest shooting in Minnesota enforcement surge fuels more calls for immigration agents to leave (Associated Press)

item.title: Some Republicans call for investigation after fatal shooting in Minneapolis
item.description: A handful of Republicans called for a deeper investigation into federal immigration tactics after a U.S. Border Patrol agent fatally shot a man in Minneapolis.

item.title: Protesters demand immigration agents leave Minneapolis after man killed during crackdown
item.description: Democrats demanded that federal immigration officers leave Minnesota after a U.S. Border Patrol agent fatally shot a man in Minneapolis on Saturday, drawing hundreds of protesters onto the frigid streets and increasing tensions in a city already shaken by ano…

item.title: Charles Barkley reacts to deadly Minnesota shootings: 'Somebody's gotta step up and be adults'
item.description: Former NBA star Charles Barkley said on Saturday that "somebody's gotta step up and be adults" in reaction to the second federal officer-involved shooting this month in Minnesota.

item.title: ‘Sickening lies’: Parents of man killed by federal agent in Minneapolis go nuclear on Trump’s ‘murdering thugs’
item.description: 'I do not throw around the hero term lightly. However his last thought and act was to protect a woman'

item.title: Alex Pretti’s Sig handgun has history of accidentally firing — offering possible clue to why Border agent shot him
item.description: The P320 model is widely carried by armed civilians and US law enforcement, including ICE — but has been the subject of more than 100 allegations that it has a defect that allows it to fire "uncommanded."

item.title: Alex Pretti, Man Killed by Federal Agents Whom the White House Labeled a Domestic Terrorist, Was ICU Nurse for Veterans
item.description: “The sickening lies told about our son by the administration are reprehensible and disgusting," Pretti's family said in a statement.

item.title: Third fatal officer-involved shooting in Minneapolis within a month exposes enforcement flaws, may heighten federal-state tension: expert
item.description: Authorities confirmed US local time Saturday that the man shot dead by US federal agents earlier in the morning in Minneapolis, Minnesota was a US citizen, marking a third shooting involving federal law enforcement officers in the city this month, the Xinhua …

item.title: GOP Sen. Cassidy breaks with Trump over deadly shooting by Border Patrol agent in Minneapolis
item.description: Republican Sen. Bill Cassidy calls for full investigation after a Border Patrol agent shot and killed a man in Minneapolis during a DHS operation on Saturday.

item.title: Man shot and killed by federal officers in Minnesota was an ICU nurse, his parents say
item.description: The man who was shot and killed by a federal officer during an immigration operation has been identified as 37-year-old Alex Pretti, an intensive care unit nurse.

item.title: Pritzker urges 'unified response' from Democrat, Republican governors after Border Patrol shoots armed man
item.description: Illinois Gov. JB Pritzker and New York Gov. Kathy Hochul slammed thee Trump administration after Border Patrol shot an armed man in Minneapolis.

item.title: Man injured in southern Colorado police chase, shooting
item.description: A Walsenburg police officer shot at a fleeing domestic violence suspect on Wednesday, according to the Colorado Bureau of Investigation.
